```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(mc2d)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

source("bin/openfair.R")  # for FAIR analysis

function(input, output) {
  values <- reactiveValues() 
	
	values$N <- 50000
	values$run <- FALSE
	
	observeEvent({
		
		if (input$runmodel != 0) {
			
			isolate({
				
				values$N <- input$N

				TEFestimate <- data.frame(L = input$tefl,  ML = input$tefml,  H = input$tefh, CONF = input$tefconf)
				TCestimate <- data.frame(L = input$tcapl,  ML = input$tcapml,  H = input$tcaph, CONF = input$tcapconf)
				DIFFestimate <- data.frame(L = input$csl,  ML = input$csml,  H = input$csh, CONF = input$csconf)
				LMestimate <- data.frame(L = input$lml, ML = input$lmml, H = input$lmh, CONF = 1)
		
				LMsample <- function(x){
				  return(sum(rpert(x, LMestimate$L, LMestimate$ML, LMestimate$H, shape = LMestimate$CONF) ))
				}
		
				TEFsamples <- rpert(values$N, TEFestimate$L, TEFestimate$ML, TEFestimate$H, shape = TEFestimate$CONF)
				TCsamples <- rpert(values$N, TCestimate$L, TCestimate$ML, TCestimate$H, shape = TCestimate$CONF)
				DIFFsamples <- rpert(values$N, DIFFestimate$L, DIFFestimate$ML, DIFFestimate$H, shape = RSestimate$CONF)
		
				VULNsamples <- TSsamples > RSsamples
				LEF <- TEFsamples[VULNsamples]
		
				values$ALEsamples <- sapply(LEF, LMsample)
				values$VAR <- quantile(values$ALEsamples, probs = (0.95))
			})
		}
  })
}
```

### Distribution

```{r plot_distribution}
renderPlot({
	if (input$runmodel != 0) {
		ALEsamples <- values$ALEsamples 
		gg <- ggplot(data.frame(ALEsamples), aes(x = ALEsamples))
		gg <- gg + geom_histogram(binwidth = diff(range(ALEsamples)/50), 
		                          aes(y = ..density..), 
		                          color = "black", 
		                          fill = "white")
		gg <- gg + geom_density(fill = "steelblue", alpha = 1/3)
		gg <- gg + scale_x_continuous(labels = comma)
		gg <- gg + theme_bw()
		print(gg)
	}
})
```
